description: Exxon Mobil Corporation, a leading integrated oil supermajor.
Chevron Corporation, an oil supermajor with upstream, midstream, and downstream operations.
ConocoPhillips, an integrated oil company.
EOG Resources, an exploration and production company with assets concentrated in the United States.
Kinder Morgan Inc, an energy infrastructure company operating pipelines and terminals.
Phillips 66, a diversified energy manufacturing and logistics company.
ONEOK Inc, a company involved in natural gas and natural gas liquids.
The Williams Companies, Inc., a company involved in natural gas transportation and processing.
Diamondback Energy Inc, an exploration and production company.
Schlumberger Limited, the world’s largest oilfield services provider.
Energy Transfer LP, a company operating energy infrastructure including pipelines.
Marathon Petroleum Corporation, a refining and marketing company.
Occidental Petroleum Corporation, an exploration and production company.
Shell plc, a multinational oil and gas company.
TotalEnergies SE, a multinational integrated oil and gas company.
Enterprise Products Partners L.P., a midstream energy company.
Targa Resources Corp, a midstream energy company.
Valero Energy Corporation, a refining and marketing company.
MPLX LP, a midstream energy company.
TC Energy Corporation, a company involved in natural gas and oil pipelines.
Suncor Energy Inc, an integrated energy company.
